CustomField.description: LEM-12453-Determines if the products are auto provisioned or the user needs to use CCP
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please check this box if you would like to manually apply the amendment changes to existing stores under the Contract using the "Manage Stores" process. Please Leave this box unchecked if you would like the amendment changes to automatically apply to all existing stores under the Contract.
CustomField.label: Use Corporate Cherry Picking
